body.name: FUNLAX Cube Storage Shelf, 9 Storage Cubes Closet Organizers and Storage Portable Cube Storage Organizer Plastic Bookshelf Bookcase for Study Room, Bedroom, Office, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 1 min
features: Large storage space: The cube storage shelf is consists of 16 cubes. Each cube of the closet is 12"*12"*12"(30cm*30cm*30cm),which holds at least pieces of T-shirt. Each cubes hold up to 22lbs (10kg),equates to 9 bottles of 33.8 Fl Oz water, which is enough for daily lightweight storage need. Puting heavier things on the bottom while light ones on the top can better protect the shelf.

Versatile: This storage cubes organizer is divided into sperate units for you to classify your items and keep everything organized. As an open shelf, you can see clearly what's in it and take it out in seconds without cluttering up the spaces. It's ideal for storing clothes, toys, clothes, books, toys, shoes, plushie collections, figure displays, purses, linen, plants, and other necessities in the living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, office, and other limited spaces.

Durable: High-density solid metal frame, thick and durable PP panel, high-hardness ABS connector and internal interlocking design together constitute a stable and durable structure of the storage cubes. Secure the corners and edges with the zip ties to double fasten the wire shelves. The cube organizer won't fall apart and you can move it after assemble with such great stability. FUNLAX high-quality storage shelf meets your lightweight storage need for years.

Creative: The modular and interlocking design of the cube storage organizer allows multiple stacking options. You can use the cube unit separately or design a different configuration according to your space and taste. Classic white is able to coordinate with different home styles. The utility and creativity of FUNLAX closet organizers and storage make it more than a great storage solution but good decor for the room, adding a Minimalistic aesthetic.

Easy to assemble and disassemble: The design of modular and interlocking allows a quick installation in 30mins with the help of the instruction. Using the hammer included will save you lots of strength. Simply disassemble the cube storages by taking off the connectors, which is perfect for people who live in a dorm or rent a house. It’s convenient to take away when moving house.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FUNLAX Wish you shop with fun & relax

Storage cubes for kitchen A perfect cube storage perfect for the kitchen to store seasonings, cookware, food, etc., increasing kitchen storage space, allowing for organized placement of kitchen supplies, and keeping the kitchen clean and tidy. Bathroom storage organizer A bathroom organization and storage are ideal for storing and organizing your toiletries, skincare products, tissues, and more for easy access. Room portable closet The customizable cube storage organizer makes good use of the vertical space. Especially suitable for limited space, dorms, and apartments to put your clothes, shoes, and bags.

Reinforced connectors The 8-groove connectors make installation and disassembly easier, saving time and effort. 2" high feet The storage shelves with 2" high connector feet can increase the lifespan of the cabinet, facilitate cleaning and maintenance, and enhance the stability and moisture resistance of the cabinet. Zip ties for double fastening The zip ties can safely secure your cube storage shelf. Reducing the risk of accidental loosening and potential injuries.

Buyers Show This is a great cube organizer for small items! I fit almost my entire yarn collection in it and I could not be happier! I am organizing my son's bedroom and computer room. These cubes are great! Lightweight but very sturdy; easy to assemble; spacious. I needed a place to store my loungefly collection and this worked beautifully! Easy to put together and it’s much sturdier than I imagined! I love it!

Easy enough to assemble. They even provided a small hammer with rubber ends to help with assembly. Very sturdy and can hold lots of toys and books. This was quick and easy to assemble, extremely sturdy, and each individual cube can accommodate large items of various weight categories without issue. It is also completely stable as a unit on the whole, too. Bought this for my collection and it’s great, and it’s easy to put together took me like 30 minutes to set up

We provide 6 9 12 16 cubby storage organizers for your choice, you can get different cubes according to your need and space. The modular design of the storage cubes allows you to change the blocks as you wish. Following the assembly steps saves your effort in installing the shelf organizer. We also included an installation manual to facilitate the assembly of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality. Easy to assemble. Easy to change or create different patterns. Fits bins well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my bookshelf, lightweight but sturdy. It came on time, all pieces were there. It took me about 15 minutes to put together. Once you build the bottom and then the second row you get the hang of it and it’s quick to build. I will be getting another one because my library is growing fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its was a challenge to assemble but I love it for the cost
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't find the instructions at first so I went into it blind. I have some mechanical know how so It wasn't so bad. But if you don't!!! Find the instructions!! They are in there somewhere. Its pretty cool when its done and sturdy! I was kind shocked at how sturdy it is when done. Use the little black zip ties also. I have some 3D printer filaments on it books and a monitor and it is holding up great. Also included some extra parts which is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy!! Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: These were exactly what I had wanted. It is surprising how sturdy they are. The price was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great storage idea. It stores a lot and takes little space. Easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These things will not stay together without zip ties??? And then they don’t even give you enough to put them together, their horrible. I have no clue how they got any good reviews at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much effort
reviews.reviewText: The assembly takes a minute to put together. But the most disappointing aspect is the fact that the joints come apart easily when you attempt to transport the cubes or place pieces that have any weight to them. I should have just purchased wooden crates.
